transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good evening, sir.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Krishna speaking from IndiaMART, sir. Bharath here, sir. How can I assist you?
Customer: Ha, ha, ha, okay.
Executive: Thank you, sir. Thank you, sir. It seems a video call was scheduled for the customer, but a mail was sent instead.
Customer: Aama aama aama, I spoke to the mam and cleared it. Pannikonga.
Executive: Enna sonninga?
Customer: I spoke to the mam and cleared it, sir.
Executive: Okay, sir, okay, sir. I thought I could close the service.
Customer: I am not getting any leads. I am still working on my website and need to get it ready.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: We have updated it. I am expecting it to come, but I don't know. 
Executive: Okay, okay. We have made some changes. Last time, there were many product-related issues.
Customer: Hmm, aama.
Executive: Aama aama, we have made some changes, right? Now, it should definitely improve.
Customer: That's what I am thinking. There is nothing positive in the history.
Executive: Okay, okay, sir.
Executive: Now, the locations you mentioned were in South India, right? Am I correct?
Customer: Aama, aama, aama.
Executive: Okay, okay. Now, when you are taking leads, in the top corner, you will see... Are you on the system right now?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Now, go to our BuyLeads section.
Executive: BuyLeads, click pannunga.
Customer: BuyLeads.
Executive: BuyLeads click pannittu, you will see an option on top to search for BuyLeads.
Customer: Aama.
Executive: In that, you can put the product enquiry you want.
Customer: Hmm, okay. So, we will share it online, right, sir?
Executive: Enna?
Customer: Mail-le, mail-le thaan, online thaan, mail-le thaan share pannunga. Appo thaan panel app ellame pannalame.
Executive: Enna sir?
Customer: Appo thaan namma panel app ellame pannalame sir.
Customer: Sir, panel, sir, actually, first, let's focus on this area and then go to the next level. That's it, nothing else.
Executive: Okay. Okay, my suggestion is just try it now. If buyers are coming, you can deal with Pan India customers.
Customer: Aaha, aama.
Executive: Aama, if you ask me, for example, even if they buy directly, they are not going to meet directly. They will discuss online, and if there are any doubts, you will present the screen on Google Meet, send it by mail, and they will release the PO.
Customer: Aama, but if the location is buyer, what is that is my suggestion actually.
Executive: Hmm, okay, sir. Buyer potential buyer. If they like the drawing you give, if they like the service, they will take it and purchase it, right?
Customer: Hmm, aama.
Executive: So, what you do is, you don't avoid it. In BuyLeads itself, you change it to India.
Customer: BuyLeads-la India-nu maathikanuma?
Executive: First, we added South India, right?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Now, do the same. Now, put India. India select pannikonga. India click pannikonga.
Customer: Innum oru nimisham. BuyLeads, BuyLeads vandhuten. Adhula India, okay, India-nu onnu irukku. India click pannikonga. Appo vandhu ella states-um adha kaamikam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Ippo India-nu eduthutanna overall-a India-la irukra maari paathu eduthukalaam. Onnum prachana irukaathu.
Executive: Hmm, aama. Idhula nee buyer potential-a paatha therinjurum. Avanga buy post pannidha individual-a illa vandhu oru company vandhu post pannidha therinjurum.
Customer: Aaha, aaha.
Executive: Ippo India-nu podrapo lead opportunity adhigam, correct-a?
Customer: Aama, aama.
Executive: Ennoda suggestion vandhu andha metro cities-la irukra andha andha states-oda metro capitals irukkum-la. Ippo Tamil Nadu-na Chennai, Tier 1, Tier 2 appadi choose pannikonga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Enna namma product therinja buyers vandhu paathinga-na anga thaan iruppanga.
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Chennai-na Chennai thaan periya industrial area, correct-a?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Ella companies-oda headquarters-um capital-la thaan irukkum.
Executive: Hmm. Andha maari vandhu pannidhinga-na andha capitals-um Tier 1, oru state-oda Tier 1, Tier 2 cities-a neenga eduthukonga.
Executive: Hmm. Appo hint-a irukkum ungalukku. Pudhusa edhum solla thevai-illa. Just sollitten ungalukku.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Appo Gujarat ippo neenga Gujarat eduthinga-na Ahmedabad paathu Gandhinagar choose pannuvaanga.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ippo neenga Maharashtra eduthinga-na Mumbai, maha, appo sorry Mumbai-yum vera oru city-kooda irukkalaam. Navi Mumbai edukkalaam. Sri Nagar city idhu.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ippo Kerala eduthuttinga-na Cochin-um, bottom metro, Thiruvananthapuram.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Chennai, Tamil Nadu-la Chennai, Coimbatore. Appo neenga mudhal-la industrial area konjam focus pannunga appadi-na Hosur, Salem, Trichy, Madurai andha maari-kooda neenga choose pannalaam. Erode, Tiruppur.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Andha maari neenga enna pannidhinga-na buyer-oda space-a vandhu neenga increase pannitte irunga. Main-a, naan solradhu vandhu main-aana cities-la.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Enna anga thaan buyer-oda opportunity adhigamaa irukkum-la.
Customer: Aama, aama.
Executive: Ippo neenga appadiye BuyLeads kammiyaa irundhadhu. Ippo India-nu click pannana paathinga oru 10-la irundhu oru 15 BuyLeads kaamikidhaa?
Executive: Hmm, aama.
Executive: Andha maari BuyLeads paathu neenga eduthurunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ippo purinjadhaa sir?
Customer: Puriyudhu, puriyudhu, puriyudhu sir.
Executive: Ippo neenga particular-a enakku indha BuyLeads ippo plus zero BuyLeads kaamikidhu. Ippo almost oru 14 to 15 BuyLeads kaamikidhu. Ippo neenga enna pannidhinga-na particular-a enakku indha BuyLeads venumnaa-kooda neenga search panni eduthukkalaam.
Customer: Aaha, aaha.
Executive: Innonnu neenga BuyLeads balance paapeenga-la?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Andha adukku mela vandhu paathinga-na past leads-nu oru option kaamikidhaa?
Executive: Past leads.
Executive: Hmm, aama, aama.
Executive: Adhukku mela adha click pannunga. Click pannidhinga-na sold out aana BuyLeads ellame varum.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Adhula ungalukku edhellaam ungalukku relevant-aa irukko adha vandhu I am interested koduthurunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Koduthuttinga-na enna-na system capture pannikkum. Adhu sold out aayittu adhu nammalukku vandha BuyLeads thaan. Adha particular time-kulla edutha-ngaati edukkaadha-ngaati adhu sold out aayidichu. Aana BuyLeads neraiya BuyLeads relevant-aa irukku. Correct-aa irukku, correct-aa?
Customer: Aama, aama.
Executive: Appo neenga enna pandreenga-na andha BuyLeads-a I am interested-nu solli kaamikidhu. System capture pannikkum. Indha BuyLeads sold out aanaalume idhukku namma company-kku vandhu relevant-nu solli. Future-la andha maari BuyLeads-a vandhu capture pannum.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Okay-ngala? Indha rendu moonu inputs-kooda follow pannunga. Regular-aa edhaavdhu doubt-naa enakku direct-aa en number-kku koopitturunga. En appadi-na WhatsApp-la oru message poduvom-la ungalukku.
Customer: Aama, aama, aama.
Executive: Indha 7373 number.
Customer: Aama, aama.
Executive: Edhaavdhu doubt irundhaalum neenga enakku call pannalaam.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Message potrukken paarunga.
Customer: Yes, paathutten message.
Executive: Adhukku appuram-naa koopidalaam neenga, okay-ngala?
Customer: Okay, okay. Bharathiyar number ungalukku theriyum-ngala? Adhukku neenga koopidalaam.
Customer: Aama, aama, aama.
Executive: Sari-nga sir. Andha conversation close pannidunga. Appuram feedback-um varum. Adha mattum koduthurunga.
Customer: Okay-nga.
Executive: Okay sir, okay. Edhaavdhu doubt-naa koopidunga.
Customer: Okay sir, sari-nga.
Executive: Okay sir, okay sir. Thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer's website is still under construction.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using the BuyLeads section.

- Executive suggested focusing on Tier 1 and 2 cities.

- Executive advised to mark relevant sold-out buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to follow the suggested steps.

- Customer can call the executive for further assistance.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, website, india, cities, potential buyers
